staxel.village.dialogue.ScientistPrimary: (안함)Oh, hello ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)How is everything these days? I heard you were working with ^c:1486b0;Aliza^c:pop; on some interesting things?
(안함)Seems you were the one who managed to secure some of the resources I used for my latest experiment too!
(안함)Hmm, is that an ^c:d03e37;airship blueprint^c:pop; you have there? How about I take a look?
(안함)No, no. This isn't going to work like that...
(안함)You can't just remove parts and expect it to go faster. That would just compromise stability!
(안함)Here, this might be a better path to follow, but there are still some fundamental problems...
(안함)You can't just break the laws of physics!
(안함)Airships don't run on magic you know! It doesn't exist!
(안함)But...say it did exist...it would probably be the key to circumventing the flaws...
(안함)Hello there, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)I've been in this village for quite some time now but I've yet to see many scientific advancements.
(안함)I suspect this is largely due to the inadequate facilities available for research and development.
(안함)After much careful consideration, I have decided to enlist your aid in rectifying the situation.
(안함)You will help me, won't you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
(안함)Of course!
(안함)Maybe some other time.
(안함)Ah. I hadn't considered this outcome.
(안함)I'll have to think on it some more...
(안함)Great! I wouldn't have expected any less from you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)So, first steps, first steps...
(안함)Right! I suppose I'll need to get a permit for the establishment of a ^c:1486b0;lab^c:pop;.
(안함)Wouldn't want to be conducting dangerous experiments without permission to do so!
(안함)^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; would be absolutely furious!
(안함)So how about you go see ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; and convince him to let us turn my home into a ^c:1486b0;lab^c:pop;?
(안함)You got the ^c:d03e37;permit^c:pop; then? Excellent!
(안함)I've already begun documenting all the ^c:1486b0;machines^c:pop; I'm going to need for my experiments.
(안함)These should tell you everything you need to know to get the place built!
(안함)I've thought hard about it, and I think you should expand ^c:1486b0;my home^c:pop; to accommodate them.
(안함)So basically, get them made and install them in ^c:1486b0;my home^c:pop;!
(안함)Any luck getting that ^c:d03e37;permit^c:pop; from ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop;?
(안함)I don't really want to start construction without his permission...
(안함)But I will if I have to!
(안함)I trust the blueprints I supplied were detailed enough?
(안함)I hope I'm not going to be in the way too much while you perform the renovations!
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! It's a ^c:1486b0;lab^c:pop;!
(안함)Ahh...that satisfying thrum of electrical motion...how have I slept without it?
(안함)I'll be sure to let you know how my experiments proceed!
(안함)I hope that I'll be able to come up with some satisfactory results!
(안함)Until then, good luck with the farm!
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! It's a disaster!
(안함)I was experimenting with my microwave when something terrible happened...
(안함)I won't go into details on the experiment itself. Suffice to say it would have changed the world had it succeeded...
(안함)But it didn't. It exploded instead. And now ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; is off cowering in a corner...
(안함)I want to make him ^c:d03e37;a gift^c:pop; as an apology...
(안함)Do you think I could trouble you to make some ^c:d03e37;machine parts^c:pop;?
(안함)One ^c:d03e37;Machine Screen^c:pop;, two ^c:d03e37;Machine Cells^c:pop;, and a ^c:d03e37;Machine Sapper^c:pop; should do it.
(안함)That was quicker than I expected, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)How do you manage to work so fast? Some of those parts can take me weeks to make myself!
(안함)I'll get to work on fixing everything up. In the meantime, feel free to go about your daily business.
(안함)There isn't much more you can do here right now.
(안함)I really want to apologise properly to ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop;...
(안함)Could you make me one ^c:d03e37;Machine Screen^c:pop;, two ^c:d03e37;Machine Cells^c:pop;, and a ^c:d03e37;Machine Sapper^c:pop;?
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! It's a miracle!
(안함)^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; seems to have forgiven us already!
(안함)I also managed to finish preparing ^c:1486b0;Leif's^c:pop; gift. Maybe you could deliver it for me?
(안함)Quickly, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)I don't want to leave ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; cowering in his store too long...
(안함)It all went well I hope?
(안함)How much was he cowering? Not at all? Well...
(안함)I hope that means he's forgiven us at least...
(안함)I heard you went out of your way to insure the town so I can perform even bigger experiments!
(안함)I hope you'll accept these as a payment of sorts...
(안함)Look forward to my next experiment!
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)I uh...may have another problem.
(안함)Don't worry though! I didn't almost blow ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; up this time...
(안함)Oh, and in case you wondered, I also didn't successfully blow him up either.
(안함)This has absolutely nothing to do with ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; at all.
(안함)Well...okay. So maybe it does. Just a little.
(안함)But it's not really my fault. It's the ^c:1486b0;monster's^c:pop; fault...
(안함)I only made it. I didn't tell it what to do!
(안함)But as soon as it came to life, it ran right out of the ^c:1486b0;lab^c:pop; and bumped into ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop;...
(안함)I don't think I've ever seen anyone jump that high before in all my years.
(안함)If only I'd had my tools on hand to evaluate at the height at the time...
(안함)But that is a different regret entirely.
(안함)For now, I need you to deliver another ^c:d03e37;gift^c:pop; to ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop;...
(안함)You gave him the ^c:d03e37;gift^c:pop;? Well at least that's one weight off my mind...
(안함)Now we just need to do something about ^c:1486b0;my creation^c:pop;...
(안함)I'll give you my tracking device so you can track him down.
(안함)Perhaps you'll have better luck convincing him to come back...
(안함)Just so you know, he's engineered to have a fondness for ^c:d03e37;candy^c:pop;.
(안함)Please run that ^c:d03e37;gift^c:pop; on over to ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop;.
(안함)I was so used to having him hanging around all the time but I'm worried I've scared him off...
(안함)You should be able to find ^c:1486b0;my creation^c:pop; on your map...
(안함)It might be worth keeping in mind that he's engineered to have a fondness for ^c:d03e37;candy^c:pop;.
(안함)You managed to bring back ^c:1486b0;my creation^c:pop;?
(안함)Ah, thank you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! You're really a miracle!
(안함)But now...somehow we still need to clean up this mess...
(안함)^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; has been clamouring after us again...maybe you could start there?
(안함)We can't keep it? I feared as much...
(안함)Do you think perhaps we might be able to sell it to one of the ^c:1486b0;merchants^c:pop;?
(안함)I could certainly use the funds for my research...
(안함)Perhaps you could go and discuss it with them?
(안함)^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; has been demanding to see us...
(안함)Do you think you could go on my behalf?
(안함)No luck there, huh?
(안함)^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; did send me a note while you were away though...
(안함)It seems like he's recovered a bit from the ordeal and it sounded like he might have an idea...
(안함)Do you think you could go find out what it is?
(안함)I can't really risk leaving ^c:1486b0;my creation^c:pop; to run off again...
(안함)Were any of the ^c:1486b0;merchants^c:pop; willing to take him?
(안함)Have you talked to them about it yet?
(안함)Have you been to see ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; yet?
(안함)It sounds like he might have an idea what to do...
(안함)So what was ^c:1486b0;Leif's^c:pop; solution?
(안함)His ^c:1486b0;sister^c:pop;, was it?
(안함)I would certainly like to meet her when she comes by to pick up ^c:1486b0;Frankie^c:pop;!
(안함)We may not quite be done with our experiments yet, but I think now is the time to give you the reward!
(안함)Thank you for taking the time to help, none of the others would have put up with my experiments!
(안함)Perhaps someday you'll agree to become a test subject! Or even a lab member!
(안함)We could even move the lab into your home if you'd like!
(안함)Just say the word!
(안함)Hm? I'm a little busy...right...
(안함)Is...is that a robot?
(안함)A robot I didn't make? Let me take a closer look!
(안함)So...so lifelike! I would never have imagined such craftsmanship!
(안함)It was responsive before? It's not just a doll? Incredible.
(안함)So... Can I have it?
(안함)No!
(안함)Aw. I thought of all people, you'd understand...
(안함)Alright then. What did you want from me? I assume you didn't come just to tease me with this beauty?
(안함)She's broken? Hm...
(안함)No, I don't think that's the case. I suspect she's just out of fuel...
(안함)^c:d03e37;8 starbits^c:pop; should do it I think!
(안함)Just bring them here and I think we can have her back up and running again, no problem.
(안함)^c:d03e37;8 starbits^c:pop; it was.
(안함)You should be able to find them at night. I don't think it'll prove too much trouble!
(안함)Ah, great, perfect! Let me just take those off your hands.
(안함)Well now...
(안함)Not even a thanks?
(안함)And here I had so many questions to ask...
(안함)I guess you'll probably want to hurry after her!
(안함)Hm, what are these?
(안함)I suppose these are my thanks for helping revive her?
(안함)Thank you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, for delivering them!
(안함)Uh...
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, I think I made a mistake...
(안함)Those items you gave me...
(안함)The letter told me to do something with the ^c:d03e37;device^c:pop; and then place it in ^c:1486b0;Leif's store^c:pop;...
(안함)Naturally...I let curiosity get the better of me. I really just wanted to see what would happen!
(안함)Now ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; has disappeared and I don't dare go near the place...
(안함)Could you...could you go take a look for me? I left the ^c:d03e37;device^c:pop; in the ^c:d03e37;cash register^c:pop;.
(안함)Did you find it?
(안함)It should be in the ^c:d03e37;cash register^c:pop;...I think.
(안함)Ah... Yeah...
(안함)That's the one.
(안함)Based on what I saw when it activated, I think it's some sort of teleportation device.
(안함)I should be able to modify it to send you wherever it took him!
(안함)Then you can find him and bring him back!
(안함)There! That should do it!
(안함)Just activate it and it'll whisk you away!
(안함)I would love to go myself, but I need to remain here and observe.
(안함)For science, you know?
(안함)Just activate it and it'll whisk you away!
(안함)I would love to go myself, but I need to remain here and observe.
(안함)For science, you know?
(안함)Did you find it?
(안함)It should be in the ^c:d03e37;cash register^c:pop;...I think.
(안함)Oh, hi ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)Hm? That teleportation device? It wasn't supposed to be recoverable?
(안함)Don't underestimate the power of science!
(안함)Naturally I improved upon it and developed something better!
(안함)I think ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; is going to be pretty pleased when he sees these...
